headline: Trey Gowdy DEMANDS Madison Cawthorn Say Which Republicans Are Big Orgy Guys, SAY IT!
author: Evan Hurst
sentences: Trey Gowdy got on Fox News the other night, and the former GOP rep from South Carolina had some WORDS for this little first-term shitbird talkin' out of school about XXX caucus meetings and whatnot.
GOWDY: and watching people do cocaine, then you're hanging around with the wrong people, but you should name them, so their constituents know what they are doing on the people’s dime.
Let's dip a toe back in and see if this thing about young Madison Cawthorn and his possible schoolboy fibs about cokeboner orgies (Roger Stone says REAL) is still going.
[...] Either tell us who you saw doing cocaine and who invited you to sexually explicit parties, or admit what we suspect, which is that you made it up.
Ohhhhhh, he is high and mighty like a bumpkin country lawyer what just got his prize milk cow insulted by somebody who should know better!
GOWDY: And then ask yourself where fairness and honesty fall on the list of qualities we should be looking for in members of Congress.
If yew name some names, Trey Gowdy'll investigate it 58 times like he investigated Benghazi, but yew better name some names!
GOWDY: I was in DC for eight years, and the people I associated with it were nothing like what this congressman described.
GOWDY: Kevin McCarthy, now, he did take us to see movies, and one time, he did order butter popcorn if that counts.

GOWDY: The people that I was around did none of what you described ever ...
Just good clean fun for these boys.
GOWDY: And if, on the other hand, none of what you described really happened, you need to admit that too.
Wonkette is ad-free and paywall-free and relies on YOU to pay us what you can, please, if you are able!
GOWDY: Joey Kennedy’s nickname was ‘milk,’ because It was the strongest thing he drank.
Should be fun, with all of them canceling Disney in the name of hating LGBTQ people.
If you’re being invited to cocaine parties by colleagues, tell us who invited you!
Who is doubling as a deviant by night while talking about family values by day?
GOWDY: Jason Chaffetz didn’t need milk because he didn’t even drink coffee.
Try to put the words "milk" and "orgy" together in a sentence, KNOW WHAT?
The good ones don’t make the news, the bad ones get all of the attention.
We continue to agree with the sorely offended Republicans on this point.
GOWDY: Which of your colleagues thinks he or she is above the law?
He's about to tell you what the people he hung out with were like.
Not anywhere in the Republican Party, so let's simmer down, Trey.
Now about that "deviant by night" family values DC roll call.
Is that really a roll call any DC Republican wants to happen?
Who broke the very laws they passed, and expect to us follow?
GOWDY: Tim Scott’s idea of a wild time was ordering dessert.
GOWDY: My question for the congressman is simply this: Who?

GOWDY: so if you are invited to NC -17 parties
"NC-17"?
Is that the correct movie rating for "come to my orgy"?
Kevin McCarthy did the butter popcorn one time.
GOWDY: John Ratcliffe would run an extra mile!
Does that sound like an orgy thing to you?
Does that sound like an orgy thing to you?
Who used illicit drugs in front of you?
Mormons are not allowed to have fun.
Yew wanna name some names, Madison?
How often would you like to donate?
Jim Jordan would do extra pushups!
Snorting DRUGS and breaking LAW?
Tim Scott was into "dessert."
Also, they called him "Milk"?
Journalists, get to digging.
Well, this has been fun.
Stop fibbin', young man!
Hooray, it sure is!
Give us the names.

YEW CANNOT.
